xco2.title: Average Dry-Air Column CO₂ (XCO₂)
xco2.description: Daily dry air column-averaged mole fractions of carbon dioxide created from data assimilations of OCO-2 satellite retrievals.

xco2prec.title: Average Dry-Air Column CO₂ Precision (XCO2PREC)
xco2prec.description: Random errors for daily dry air column-averaged mole fractions of carbon dioxide calculated using a posteriori diagnostics.
